arts.ttl: Chelsea transfer news: Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall could leave in January, admits Enzo Maresca
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca admits that there are no guarantees that Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall will spend the second half of the season at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: The Verdict: Chelsea youngsters pass European test but what's next?
arts.sum: Sky Sports News' James Cole and Sky Sports football journalist David Richardson analyse Chelsea's 5-1 win over Shamrock Rovers and what's next for Enzo Maresca's youngsters.

arts.ttl: Marc Guiu hat-trick helps Chelsea finish off overpowered Shamrock Rovers
arts.sum: Chelsea signed off with a perfect record in the league phase of the Conference League as Marc Guiu scored a first-half hat-trick to seal a 5-1 demolition of League of Ireland side Shamrock Rovers at Stamford Bridge. The 18-year-old former Barcelona striker is yet to start for Enzo Maresca in the Premier League but, selected for the fourth time in Europe, he demonstrated a poacher’s instinct to bury the visiting side, twice intercepting passes back to the goalkeeper to score before glancing in a fine header for his third. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Marc Guiu tipped as Chelsea's next "big star" after Shamrock Rovers hat-trick
arts.sum: CHELSEA 5-1 SHAMROCK ROVERS: Marc Guiu scored a first-half hat-trick for the Blues and club legend Joe Cole believes the striker has what it takes to become a "big star"

arts.ttl: Chelsea 5-1 Shamrock Rovers: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Marc Guiu nets first half hat-trick
arts.sum: Five-star Chelsea run riot as Marc Guiu nets hat-trick in 5-1 win against Shamrock Rovers in the Conference League on Thursday, securing a flawless league phase campaign.

arts.ttl: Guiu nets hat-trick as Chelsea hammer Shamrock Rovers to top Conference League
arts.sum: Marc Guiu scored a first-half hat-trick as Chelsea finished top of the Conference League table with a flawless record after a 5-1 victory over Shamrock Rovers.

arts.ttl: Chelsea 5-1 Shamrock Rovers: Enzo Maresca's side cruise to dominant win to continue perfect Europa Conference League record
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL AT STAMFORD BRIDGE: Chelsea's 18-year-old striker Marc Guiu scored a first-half hat-trick to make it six wins from six in the Conference League.

arts.ttl: How many youngsters? Chelsea XI named for Shamrock Rovers clash
arts.sum: Chelsea name their starting XI for Thursday's Conference League game versus Shamrock Rovers.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Shamrock Rovers - Europa Conference League: Live score, team news and updates as Enzo Maresca's side aim to maintain perfect start in Europe
arts.sum: Follow Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates as Chelsea host Shamrock Rovers in the Europa Conference League.

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Shamrock Rovers – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Chelsea conclude their Europa Conference League league phase campaign against Shamrock Rovers this evening. The Blues take on Irish opposition for the first time in Europe, in what will be a huge occasion for the visitors at Stamford Bridge.
